title: WTB: 1895 Mayo Kid Nichols low grade and Fred Pfeffer

posts.post_title: WTB: 1895 Mayo Kid Nichols low grade and Fred Pfeffer
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I am trying to find a low grade or beater example of a 1895 Mayo Kid Nichols.  I am also trying to find a low grade Fred Pfeffer either version as well.  If anyone has one for sale please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks as always

Tony
